name: Goblin's Redempiton
description:
Explore the dungeons, find the Lord, and defeat him - you must win! 

This game was made in 7 days for the 7DRL jam.

How to play:

 WASD to move

 Left click for right hand attack

 Right click for left hand attack 

Q to switch weapons in the left hand quick slot 

E to switch weapons in the right hand quick slot 

R to lock on to target 

Pressing Shift once will make you do a roll

Holding down Shift will make you Sprint

 Use keys 1, 2, and 3 to activate your abilities Please read the "How to play" tab in-game.

Roguelike elements:

 In this game, death is final.  When you die, the game ends and you lose. 

Dungeons are procedurally generated with randomly generated room types.

 At the beginning and end of each dungeon, you'll be given the chance to choose a random weapon or ability.
